Name: ReFrame
About the game: In this VR Puzzle game, you take on an epic Journey by moving around a little Fellow. Meet the Giant Clock tower and three other small little friends on the way! Collect Ordinary, but therefore Special Engravings as you move on. Features: 1. Light up the lantern to make the world shift into a whole new place. 2. The world will change into a wholly new place within the Range that you choose. 3. Combine, Use special Abilities the Figures grant you with. 4. Survey the Area carefully. 5. Look for hidden Background Stories! 6. Cute friends are always willing to aid you. 7. The Rest will be released real soon :) The Last friend of the three will be accompanying your journey Shorty. Please wait up and look forward to the game!
